Posts.EditableText:
I decided to make a map of my adventure on paper to avoid getting lost while I was making it with Quest.

Now I've lost the map.
Posts.HTML:
I decided to make a map of my adventure on paper to avoid getting lost while I was making it with Quest.

Now I've lost the map.

Posts.EditableText: That is, with out doubt, the funniest thing since Hellen Keller.
Posts.HTML: That is, with out doubt, the funniest thing since Hellen Keller.

Posts.EditableText: I hate it when that happens to me too.... especially if it's a really hard map... lolz. You can either try turning your room unside down for it or just making another, which ever you think is best. But try looking for it first, as you may just finish making the new one whne you spot the old one and kick yourself hard. please don't, lol. I look forward to your game...
Posts.HTML: I hate it when that happens to me too.... especially if it's a really hard map... lolz.
